name: Luvv7
description: This was my first React project. I made it for a friend, it's a blog where he can write, edit and delete posts from a database. Also anyone can create an account and customize their profile. Supabase is used for the database. I learned a lot with this project.

name: Media Dash
description: A React dashboard for all your company needs. Built with Material UI and Nivo charts.
